name: New Frontair
description: New Frontair puts the player in the place of a newly promoted supervisor currently that has to manage stowaways that have secretly snuck in to three (3) spacecrafts on route to Mars. They are tasked to ensure that the current stowaways are able to stay healthy to survive Mars’ harsh living conditions. Each decision the player makes will have a corresponding positive or negative consequence on each prisoner depending on the stowaway’s current status.
